description: Tiny and lightweight micro servo motor with high output power. Rotates approximately 180° (±90°) and is suitable for beginners and small projects. Comes with 3 arms and hardware.
related_products: MG996R All Metal Gear Servo Motor
25T Metal Horns Round Disc For MG995 Servomotor
Aluminum Dual Clamping Arm/Horn for Servo Motor

specifications.dimensions: Length: 0.91 in (23.0 mm), Width: 0.48 in (12.2 mm), Height: 1.14 in (29.0 mm)

getting_started.connection_guide: Connect the red wire to the 5V pin on the Arduino, the black/brown wire to a GND pin, and the signal wire to pin 9. Upload the Arduino "Sweep" example to see the servo move 180° back and forth.

source_document: Handsontec.com User Guide SG90 TowerPro Micro Servo Motor
